show.subtitle: Stories and news that affect us all
show.title: Leid Stories

title: Leid Stories
content:
Go Ahead, Get It Said! It’s Open Forum on Leid Stories! <!--more--> You can’t possibly be neutral – not in this political climate, with all hell breaking loose at just about every level of government.
The mic is open; we await your considered opinion on the issues of the day.
Go ahead, get it said!
It’s Open Forum on Leid Stories, and you take the conversation wherever you want it to go.
But be on point, because very savvy folks are listening to you.
